snippet: A graduate of The Citadel who went on to work with children there and at other schools and served as a foster parent pleaded guilty to 22 counts of child sexual abuse.
abstract: Louis ReVille pleads guilty to 22 counts of child sexual abuse and is sentenced to 50 years in prison; ReVille is a graduate of The Citadel who went on to work with children there and at other schools in South Carolina.
lead_paragraph: A graduate of The Citadel who went on to work with children there and at other schools and served as a foster parent pleaded guilty to 22 counts of child sexual abuse.

headline.main: South Carolina: Man Gets 50 Years for Molesting Over 20 Children
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Man Gets 50 Years For Molesting Over 20 Children

keywords.value: Citadel, The Military College of South Carolina
keywords.name: organizations
